info.jonclark.treegraft.core.formatting.forest
Class ParseForestFormatter<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token,F>

java.lang.Object
  info.jonclark.treegraft.core.formatting.forest.ParseForestFormatter<R,T,F>
Type Parameters:
R - The rule type being used in this ChartParser
T - The token type being used in this ChartParser
F - Target return data type for the ParseForest
public abstract class ParseForestFormatter<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token,F>
extends java.lang.Object

Transforms a Chart into a parse forest of some arbitrary data type.

Author:
Jonathan Clark
